text: The 2020–21 FC Liefering season was the eighth season of FC Liefering in the second league. The team took second place with the same points as champions FC Blau-Weiß Linz. On the last match day they welcomed Blau-Weiß Linz. With a win they would have won the championship. But the game ended in a draw. The season was overshadowed by the COVID-19 pandemic. Most games took place without spectators or a limited number. ==Squad == * Goalkeeper:30 Adam Stejskal, 34 Jonas Krumrey * Defender: 3 Lukas Wallner, 4 Benjamin Böckle, 70 Amar Dedic, 42 David Affengruber, 5 Bryan Okoh, 32 Lukas Ibertsberger, 29 Sandro-Luca Molnar, 37 Daouda Guindo * Midfielder: 28 Sebastian Aigner, 8 Alexander Prass, 16 Samuel Major, 15 Maurits Kjaergaard, 6 Mamady Diambou, 13 Nicolas Seiwald, 20 Thomas Schiestl, 27 Mamadou Sangare, 36 Justin Omoregie, 45 Nene Dorgeles, 24 Forson Amankwah * Forwards: 21 Benjamin Šeško, 25 Elias Havel, 19 Antonin Svoboda * Staff: Matthias Jaissle (Coach), Florens Koch , Alexander Hauser (Assistance coaches), Heinz Arzberger (Goalkeeper coach) ==Matches == Austria Soccer ==Friendly matches == Due to the COVID-19 pandemic no attendence was allowed ==Top scorer== Name Goals Benjamin Sesko 21 Junior Adamu 7 Alexander Prass 6 2\.
